titleStmt.title: The smoke of the bottomlesse pit. Or, A more true and fuller discovery of the doctrine of those men which call themselves Ranters: or, the Mad Crew. / By John Holland porter, an eye and ear witnesse. Licensed and entred according to order.
titleStmt.author: Holland, John, porter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old-Baylie,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 22 1650", the 51 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old-Baylie
